fields.description:
1.pull and install KS today
2.grab ci build from server
3.launch and base UI tab

results: blank tab, output:

Thu May  5 09:14:48 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0x3193][3737] <Notice>: [ERROR] application received error: Could not find the file version.js
Thu May  5 09:14:48 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0x3193][3737] <Notice>: [ERROR] Script Error = Can't find variable: isIPhone3_2_Plus at base_ui.js (line 2).
Thu May  5 09:14:48 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0x3193][3737] <Notice>: [ERROR] application received error: Can't find variable: isIPhone3_2_Plus at base_ui.js (line 2)
fields.summary: Blank UI Tab on KS - testing blocker
fields.environment: May 5 2011 00:40 rf8dfdf71, all supported ios devices

comments.body: TIMOB-3906 #fixed-in-qa This time, for sure. When removing a path component, add a /. to ensure we don't .. too far up.
